title: Understanding the UPDATE Statement
text: The UPDATE statement is used to modify existing records in a table. It can change one or more columns for all rows that meet a specified condition.

title: Using the SET Clause
text: The SET clause in an UPDATE statement specifies the columns to be updated and the new values to assign to them. You can use arithmetic operations to adjust the values.

title: Applying Conditions with WHERE
text: The WHERE clause is used to specify which rows should be updated. Only rows that meet the condition will be affected by the UPDATE statement.

hintAnswer: It increases the salary of all employees in the Sales department by 10%.
title: Analyzing the SQL Query
text: What does the SQL query do to the employees' salaries in the Sales department?
choices: It increases the salary of all employees in the Sales department by 10%.
It sets the salary of all employees in the Sales department to 10%.
It increases the salary of all employees in the company by 10%.
It sets the salary of all employees in the company to 10%.
